telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.desc: Get a hold on items beyond your reach.

unveil.name: unveil
unveil.desc: Uncover the true version of something.

shatter.name: shatter
shatter.desc: Destroy all rocks surrounding you in a @-tile radius.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.desc: Open certain things that are locked.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.desc: Appear at another location in the vicinity.

dash.name: dash
dash.desc: Move up to @ tiles into a certain direction.

liberate.name: liberate
liberate.desc: Free yourself from any movement restraints.

healing_aura.name: healing aura
healing_aura.desc: Rejuvinate everything in a region of 2 tiles around you, healing @ hp at the centre.

cure.name: cure
cure.desc: Remove any effects negatively affecting your health.

deflect.name: deflect
deflect.desc: Return the next incomming hit back to its origin.

charge.name: charge
charge.desc: Protect yourself from incomming hits for @ turns.

frostbite.name: frostbite
frostbite.desc: Display a nagging cold that slows down your opponent.

freeze.name: freeze
freeze.desc: Stop your opponent from moving for @ turns.

ensnare.name: ensnare
ensnare.desc: Stop your opponent from moving for @ turns.

weaken.name: weaken
weaken.desc: Reduce the effectivity of your opponent's armour.

blind.name: blind
blind.desc: Marginally reduce your opponent's vision to @ tiles.

lightning.name: lightning
lightning.desc: Send out an agonizing beam of lightning to deal @ damage to everything it comes into contact with.

detonate.name: detonate
detonate.desc: Create an explosion at a certain location, dealing @ damage at the centre.

disorient.name: disorient
disorient.desc: Make your opponent dizzy for @ turns.

confuse.name: confuse
confuse.desc: Have your opponent forget where he came from and what its intentions were.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.desc: Blow everything in a region of @ tiles around you away.
